title: Internetwork Security
description: Hands-on experimentation and evaluation of internet security theory, principles, and practices. Laboratory component involves implementing both defensive and offensive security techniques. Credit not awarded for both ECE 4112 and ECE 4115.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ECE 3600 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ECE 4110 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CS 3251 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
